title: Billie on I Didnâ€™t Change My Number (Spotify Commentary)
lyrics:
[Spoken Word]
"Didn't Change My Number"... I love this song so much. It's all about... you can't... get me anymore. Where it's like "you know what? I don't sympathy for you anymore. You know, you got me, you got me at first but I don't care now," and it's really that, and that only. And, um... kind of just your last straw and being like "I am confident in this being my last straw" [laughs]. You know, "don't get me mad 'cause I will scream."
